DOC.brief_summary: Assess efficacy 2 Cervical Pessaries contain 6.3 g 7.7 g micronized progesterone prevention preterm delivery , establish spontaneous birth gestation week 32 ( 31 6/7 ) 34 ( 33 6/7 ) , pessary insert week 16th 24th remove 36 6/7 week pregnant woman high risk premature birth .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Cervical Pessary Containing Progesterone Prevention Preterm Delivery
DOC.criteria: Women singleton intrauterine pregnancy , 1025 mm cervical length gestation week 16 24 , prior risk factor . Women singleton intrauterine pregnancy 10 mm cervical length 16 24 week gestation , prior risk factor : Prior history preterm delivery gestation week 35 Prior history premature rupture membrane gestation week 35 Pregnancies : Major fetal abnormality , lethal malformation defect require pre postnatal surgery ; fetal death randomization . Prior history premature rupture membrane prophylactic cervical cerclage study entry . Cervical and/or vaginal injury prior pessary insertion ( e.g. , cervical erosion secondary trauma , infection , cancer ; vesicovaginal rectovaginal fistula ) . Unconscious , severely ill mentally disabled woman , woman 16 year age young
